To find a particular school district, and how it relates to a specific apartment, please contact the apartment manager., 24048=~ $300 to 1 Month Free ~ Welcome to Bolingbrook's newest luxury community. Meadows at River Run offers an unparalleled living experience in southwest suburban Chicagoland. Close to all major thoroughfares (I-88, I-355, and I-55), our community provides a convenient commute to Chicago, and is close to the hottest shopping and restaurants of Bolingbrook. Living in Bolingbrook does not get any better than this. Choose one of the seven thoughtfully designed floor plans that are offered at Meadows at River Run. * In the comfort of a home filled with warm touches and stylish details, you'll find the luxurious surroundings you so richly deserve. Each apartment home features an all electric kitchen, generous closet space and so much more. At Meadows at River Run, you'll find restoration for both body and mind. Elegantly styled apartment homes, a heated swimming pool, a 24 hour fitness center, cyber cafe, and lush landscaping await you in this resort-style setting at the end of Whitewater Drive. Visit our photo gallery to see why the Meadows at River Run Apartments is the perfect place to call home.
